sentence.Network_en: The Calvinist doctrine that God neglected to designate those who would the elect.

sentence.Network_en: His father was a professor of medieval studies and his mother a strict Calvinist.

entry.tran: 加尔文教派的;加尔文主义的
entry.def: Calvinist means belonging or relating to a strict Protestant church started by John Calvin.
A Calvinist is a member of the Calvinist church.

means.word_mean: 1. an adherent of the theological doctrines of John Calvin
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Calvinism or its adherents
